title: Real-Time-Poll-Rooms
shortDescription: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, admin dashboard, and real-time inventory management.
fullDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with the MERN stack, featuring secure payment processing through Stripe, real-time inventory tracking, and an intuitive admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and customers. The platform includes advanced search functionality, product filtering, and a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices.
challenges: Implemented real-time inventory sync across multiple users
Optimized database queries for faster product searches
Integrated secure payment processing with Stripe webhooks
Built scalable architecture to handle high traffic

title: QR-Genrator
shortDescription: Collaborative task management tool with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and analytics dashboard.
fullDescription: A powerful task management application designed for teams, featuring real-time collaboration through Socket.io, drag-and-drop task organization, and comprehensive analytics. Users can create projects, assign tasks, set deadlines, and track progress with visual dashboards and reports.
challenges: Implemented real-time synchronization for multiple users
Built complex state management with Redux

title: Restobook
shortDescription: Analytics dashboard for social media metrics with data visualization and automated reporting.
fullDescription: An analytics platform that aggregates social media data from multiple sources, providing comprehensive insights through interactive charts and graphs. Features automated report generation, custom metrics tracking, and scheduled email reports for stakeholders.
challenges: Optimized data processing for large datasets

title: Weather Forecast App
shortDescription: Real-time weather application with location-based forecasts and interactive maps.
fullDescription: A modern weather application that provides accurate forecasts using OpenWeather API, featuring interactive maps with Leaflet, hourly and weekly forecasts, and location-based weather alerts. The app includes beautiful weather animations and supports multiple locations.
challenges: Optimized API calls to reduce costs
